name: Néastéria Fall
description:
This was the first game we made ever, back in April 2018. We challenged ourselves to make a game in one month as we were teenagers with very low knowledge about game development.

It's a simple game where you have to move your way around the asteroids using the arrow keys. Press ENTER in order to start the game.

There are many bugs and other problems in this game, and we probably won't ever fix them as this project is more than 3 years old now.

CREDITS

Game Design - Gaëtan Piou, Philippe-Albert Leblanc, Romane Carraud
Programming - Gaëtan Piou
Art - Romane Carraud
Music - Philippe-Albert Leblanc

SPECIAL THANKS

A huge thanks to Collin HENRY, Elliot Lazlaïan Panard and Malo L. for their help on the project !
